[[inst_lbi]]
==== LBI

*Syntax:* lbi [SrcL, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load 8-bit signed byte from memory at effective address.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lbi.svg[LBI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/BASE_IMM
